mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( name, email, password, role_id, updater_id, created, updated, delflg ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{email}, #{password}, #{roleId}, #{updaterId}, #{created}, #{updated}, #{delflg} )
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET name = #{userName}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, role_id = #{roleId}, updater_id = #{updaterId}, created = #{created}, updated = #{updated}, delflg = #{delflg} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name AS "userName", email, password, role_id AS "roleId", updater_id AS "updaterId", created, updated, delflg FROM users WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT users.id, users.name AS "userName", users.email, users.password, users.role_id AS "roleId", users.updater_id AS "updaterId", users.created, users.updated, users.delflg, updater.name AS "updaterName" FROM users INNER JOIN users AS updater ON users.updater_id = updater.id
